examples.example: 接下来的日子里，我要更加努力地提升自己。

translate.english: In the following days, I will strive harder to improve myself.

examples.example: 接下来的旅程一定会充满惊喜和欢乐。

translate.english: The next journey will definitely be full of surprises and joys.

examples.example: 接下来的生活一定会更加美好且充满希望。

translate.english: The following life will definitely be more beautiful and full of hope.
